column4: anybody has problems with pdf-file-icons? In Nautilus I only see a little version of the pdf file. Any ideas how to resolve this, please?
indeed it is a feature of gnome that it displays little icons showing the first page of a PDF or text file.
Look at system -> preferences -> file management.  Disable showing the preview for the files you want (such as "other previewable files") - that might be what you want?
I dont have a File mnagement option
